blog.title: blog
blog.blurb: in which I write about things, mostly code.

pow-core.title: pow-core
pow-core.blurb: A set of Typescript classes and grunt tasks that are at the core of the other pow projects.

pow2.title: pow2
pow2.blurb: A 2D RPG game written in Typescript, using LESS and AngularJS, that deploys to Heroku.

pow-edit.title: pow-edit
pow-edit.blurb: A tilemap editor written in Typescript, using LESS and AngularJS, that runs as both a native application and a deployed website.

acl.title: acl
acl.blurb: A cross-platform C/C++ application core library, that is continuously tested on Windows, Mac and Linux.

binary-trunk.title: binary-trunk
binary-trunk.blurb: A set of CoffeeScript classes for modeling binary trees and laying them out visually.
